#### General

## Cheat sheets

-   <https://cheatsheet.juliadocs.org/>

#### Books

Here is a [list of books](https://julialang.org/learning/books/).

-   [Julia for Data Analysis](https://www.manning.com/books/julia-for-data-analysis)

-   [Hands-On Design Patterns and Best Practices](https://www.amazon.com/dp/183864881X)

-   [Julia High Performance](https://www.packtpub.com/en-us/product/julia-high-performance-9781788298117)

-   [Data Science using Julia](https://juliadatascience.io/)

-   [Julia Quick Syntax Reference](https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/979-8-8688-0965-1#toc)

#### Online courses

-   [Julia for Data Science](https://juliaacademy.com/p/julia-for-data-science)

-   [Learn Julia in 4 hours](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KlorfxsdWDw) (for beginners to programming)

-   [Introduction to Computational thinking](https://computationalthinking.mit.edu/Fall20/) at MIT (using Julia throughout)

-   [Advanced Scientific Computing](https://youtu.be/x4oi0IKf52w?si=WyIkge3sbYCTEjZ2) (open source software development using Julia)
